name: 2 Bee or Not 2 Bee
description:
Will you bee the one to survive?

WASD to move
SPACE to shoot
PRESS E to use pick-ups

To Bee or Not To Bee, that is the question inspired from the themes of "Engaging" and "Protect" in our game for the IndieCade Climate Jam. You play as the humble honeybee, that must traverse the vast and dangerous woods to defend your homeland from the invading wasps.

This game is to help spread awareness of the dangers bees face with climate change, parasites and more in their daily lives.

To find out more about what you can do to help save bees in your local area, please checkout Greenpeace's Save The Bees Campaign.



Main Team:

2D Artist - D0ggo

....and You! Thank you for playing our game.
